definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: The land cracked and the springs dried up and the cattle listlessly nibbled dry twings.
sentences.chinese: 土地龜裂，泉水乾枯，牛兒無精打采地啃着幹樹枝。

sentences.english: Till a' the seas gang dry.
Over-washing can dry your hair, making it brittle, so only wash when you have to.
sentences.chinese: 洗得太頻繁會使頭髮乾枯易斷，所以還是控制一下吧。

sentences.english: And that the world should dry as a dead leaf.
sentences.chinese: 這世界乾枯如同一片死葉。

sentences.english: Although their juices had run dry， the leaves still exuded a pleasant aroma.
sentences.chinese: 儘管已乾枯，落葉仍散發出好聞的香味。

sentences.english: Althought their juices had run dry, the leaves still exuded a pleasant aroma.
sentences.chinese: 儘管已乾枯，落葉仍散發出好聞的香味。

sentences.english: Kalahari: The Great Thirstland Long spells of sparse rains leave riverbeds dry, and little to eat.
sentences.chinese: 稀少雨水的長期循環造成河牀乾枯，食物非常少。

sentences.english: The hair with sere shag arranges slippery nature, bring withy arrange slippery beautiful hair.
sentences.chinese: 使蓬鬆乾枯的頭髮順滑自然，帶來柔韌順滑的秀髮。

sentences.english: The plants are as dry as tinder after this long drought.
sentences.chinese: 植物經過長期乾旱之後乾枯得如同火絨一般。

sentences.english: She doesn't like to sit there doing nothing.
sentences.chinese: 她沒有情願甚麼也沒有乾枯坐正在閡薛。

sentences.english: Long-deceased trees cling stubbornly to the steep flanks of Grand Sable Dunes in Michigan's Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore.
sentences.chinese: 一些長期乾枯的樹木緊緊地陷在大貂丘那陡峭的側面。

sentences.english: And nearly 20-million hectares of crops are drying up.
sentences.chinese: 而且接近2千萬公頃莊稼乾枯了。

sentences.english: Their leaves then dry up and turn brown.
sentences.chinese: 作物的葉子很快會乾枯隨即變成褐色。

sentences.english: In the first of a new series starting today, we investigate the dusty state of Taiwan's riverbeds.
sentences.chinese: 今天開始新的專題，帶你瞭解臺灣乾枯河牀的影響。

sentences.english: A little life with dried tubers .
sentences.chinese: 使乾枯的根芽得到一點點生命的滋養。

sentences.english: Hence Venus withers under a runaway greenhouse effect.
sentences.chinese: 所以金星在溫室效應的影響下會逐漸乾枯。

definition: (of dry soil, skin etc) to crack/to chap
to dry (of weather, paint, cement etc)/desiccation/dull/uninteresting/arid
venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
